title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Identify and document the functional and non-functional requirements of the DistributedSimulationEnvironment.

title: Design Architecture for DistributedSimulationEnvironment
description: Create a high-level and detailed design of the architecture for the DistributedSimulationEnvironment, including communication protocols and data storage strategies.

title: Implement Backend for DistributedSimulationEnvironment
description: Develop the backend components of the DistributedSimulationEnvironment, including data processing, simulation engine, and inter-node communication.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for DistributedSimulationEnvironment
description: Create the user interface for the DistributedSimulationEnvironment, allowing users to set up simulations and visualize results.

title: Database Design and Implementation for DistributedSimulationEnvironment
description: Create a database schema to store simulation data, user configurations, and other relevant metadata.

title: Deploy and Integrate Components of DistributedSimulationEnvironment
description: Set up the development, testing, and production environments for the DistributedSimulationEnvironment and integrate the various components.

title: Unit Testing of DistributedSimulationEnvironment Components
description: Develop unit tests to ensure the proper functioning of each component in the DistributedSimulationEnvironment. Tests should cover all aspects of each component, including edge cases and potential failure modes. Include test cases for scenarios involving interactions between components, as well as isolation tests for individual components.

title: System Integration Testing of DistributedSimulationEnvironment
description: Conduct system integration testing to ensure that the components of the DistributedSimulationEnvironment work together as expected.
dependencies: Deploy and Integrate Components of DistributedSimulationEnvironment

title: Security Review and Implementation for DistributedSimulationEnvironment
description: Perform a security review of the DistributedSimulationEnvironment and implement any necessary measures to protect user data and system integrity.

title: Documentation and Knowledge Sharing for DistributedSimulationEnvironment
description: Write clear, concise, and comprehensive documentation for the DistributedSimulationEnvironment. This includes user guides, API references, development best practices, explanations of key concepts, and a tutorial to guide new users through the setup and usage process.
